name: Warden of Control
description:
Warden of control is a village management game, based on strategy games from the 90's, where you don't have direct control over your actions. The game decides what happens each turn and you can only select the outcomes. Watch out what you choose though, because when you lose the control over your villagers, they will revolt.

This game is our submission for GMTK gamejam 2020. The theme is "out of control".

Made By: 

  • Steven Kitson
  • Nick Sterckx
  • Jonas Van Saet

Instructions: 

Unzip the file and rune GMTK2020.exe
